Posts.Content: Hi I had invasive cancer grade 2 er pr positive her2 negative.  Mastectomy and full node clearance.  I was node positive too and pushed for the oncotype test which I am glad I did as my recurrence score was 14 so I managed to avoid any chemo just radio and hormone treatment. Good luck on your journey x
Posts.Title: A question around chemo needed please

Posts.Content: Hi. I am just coming to the end of my radiotherapy and had my first boost on Friday.  Boosts are fairly routine to further target the tumour area.  They are much quicker than the normal sessions as well.  Hope that helps any questions just ask. J
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy boosters?

Posts.Content: Hi there I had left side mastectomy in late December with no reconstruction as wasn’t possible at the time due to four different tumours. I had planned to have reconstruction at a later date but having lived with it for six months and using a prosthetic, unless undressed no one would no so feel comfortable with it.  I even go out without a bra on many occasions I’m 49 now and did worry about dating etc in the future but now don’t Good luck with your decision x
Posts.Title: Mastectomy Choices....Any Thoughts?
